title: ✦NEWLY RENOVATED 1.5Bed apt by Harvard (Heat and Water inc.)
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 301926403', 'Rent: $2,650 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Stunning living area with natural lighting.', 'Conveniently located minutes from public transportation, Trader Joes, and a variety of food locations and shops.', '*HEAT AND HOT WATER INCLUDED*', 'Please call/email Chris to schedule a showing!', '7812281766', 'chrisg @ <URL>', 'Click the link below to search all of my available apartments!', 'https://ygl.is/chris-gemayel', 'Bus: 57 Brighton Ave @ (0.24 mi)', 'Chris Gemayel', 'Phone: 781 228 1766', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC', '107 Brighton Avenue', 'Boston, MA 02134', "Not what you're looking for?", 'Message me anyways!', 'I have access to one of the largest apartment databases in Greater Boston and would love to help with your next home search!', "Search Boston's largest selection of apartments <URL>", 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
